about_the_game:
Before the end of the world, you died.

But Stella didn't want to see such an ending, so you resurrected in another timeline of the world and started your battle again.

Innovative, diverse and balanced card mechanism

  • Basic rules that are easy to learn but difficult to master: Use special energy rules and card drawing rules to achieve the ultimate control of card cycles.

  • De-genre construction: There are a lot of coordination and constraints between cards, and each card has its own special features.

  • Exquisite values: In the excitement of surviving desperate situations again and again, constantly approaching the limit, and enjoying victory after squeezing out all possibilities!

Continuously getting stronger in crucial decisions

  • Far-reaching trade-offs: Decide what to do every day in the level, is it to solve urgent problems or invest in the future?

  • Qualitative change after breaking through the critical point: After continuous operation, you will obtain key cards and parasites, and your combat effectiveness will increase significantly!

More interesting content and features are still under development

content_descriptors.notes: General adult content, fantasy violence, suicide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A deck-building Roguelike game with subversive and innovative underlying card mechanism, full of strategic decision-making opportunities. In a dark fantasy world that is collapsing, Play the card of Divine Sin, gain powerful power, bear the price of being contaminated, and survive.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
